original: intros u v H. unfold orthogonal. apply double_orthogonal. - apply rotation with (u':=v) (v':=opp u). + apply (vR_R_compatible (cons u v) (opp u) v (opp v)) in H. * apply H. * apply oppu_oppv. + apply oppu_oppv. - apply orthogonal_opp. apply orthogonal_sym. apply rotation with (u':=u) (v':=opp v). + apply (vR_R_compatible (cons v (opp u)) u v (opp v)). * apply rotation with (u':=u) (v':=v) in H. ++ apply H. ++ apply Chasles. * apply permute. + apply permute.
